explains: adj. 天真烂漫的；孩子似的

sentences.en: He retained a childlike sense of wonder.
sentences.cn: 他仍然有一种孩子般的好奇感。

sentences.en: His most enduring quality is his childlike innocence.
sentences.cn: 他最持久不变的特质是孩子般的天真无邪。

sentences.en: "I do not doubt thee," said the King, with a childlike simplicity and faith.
sentences.cn: “我不怀疑你。”国王带着孩子般的天真和信任说。
